attributes.action: Establishment cover up of activities by Cyril Smith and others in Parlaiment
attributes.additional_details:
Now that police have dropped their investigation into alleged activities of the Late Cyril Smith and other still living due to lack of funds.
I call on the Government to launch a Judge led public inquiry into why alleged offences were never fully investigated and charges brought, what involvement MI5 / MI6 & the Political establishment had in getting local police forces to drop their investigation, and the involvement of those people still sitting in the House of Commons and the House of Lords who appear to be covering up such vile crimes against Children.
